message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to us, we're considering a price of $12000 for it. We believe this is a fair offer that reflects both the product's worth and your interest in it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to counter your offer with a price of $10500. We hope this aligns better with both our valuation of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $9800. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
Considering your latest proposal, we've decided to counter with an offer of $10200. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our valuation of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $9500. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
After further consideration, we've decided to counter with an offer of $9850. We hope this price helps bridge the gap between our valuation of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $9200. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
Considering your latest proposal, we've decided to counter with an offer of $9400. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our valuation of the product and your budget.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
